section.title: Linux upgrade from 1.8.1 notes
section.p: When you upgrade from Couchbase Server 1.8 to a higher release of Couchbase Server on Linux, be aware of the OpenSSL requirement. OpenSSL is a required component and an error message occurs during upgrade if it is not installed. To install it Red Hat-based systems, use yum:
